comments.html:
Something I don't understand from the post: Isn't the result the same in any case, except for the error log? I mean, if you try to remove a network, ip address or process that does not exist, it will continue not existing in any case.

Aside from this, I see that receiving an error message can be a nice feedback ("did I just mistype the address?"), which in "industry standard CLI" could be missing.
